name: Vortex (itch) (Myzreal)
description:
Vortex is a tiny space shooter game where you get to shoot down enemies and asteroids, avoid lasers and missiles and see how long can you go as the difficulty increases! Restore energy shield by shooting enemies and use various powerups to your advantage.

It's kill or be killed!

Thanks to @KenneyNL for awesome game assets and @nosoapradio_us for equally awesome music!
